app.name: Ai Paper Tool
app.tagline: AI-powered accuracy, instant academic papers in Word/PDF

input.title: Enter Prompt
input.placeholder: Please enter your paper topic, keywords or specific requirements...
input.pure_placeholder: Please paste your existing paper content, we will format it according to the selected template...

preview.title: Document Preview
preview.empty: Please enter a prompt and select a template

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: We offer two document formatting methods to meet your different needs

pure.title: Pure Formatting
pure.description: Format your existing paper content according to the selected template, keeping the original content unchanged and ensuring the format meets requirements. Suitable for users who have completed content creation and only need format adjustment.

ai.title: AI Extension/Auto Writing
ai.description: Based on your provided keywords, outline, or topic, AI automatically generates complete paper content and formats it according to the selected template. Suitable for users who need to quickly complete assignments or seek writing inspiration.
